el:identity.el:title: Scarlet's Necklace
el:identity.el:subtitle: Who did broke the pearl necklace?

el:comments.el:credits: Pearl theme inspired by Jacob Scott, Scarlett story by Andreas Lochmann

el:string.el:english: Mrs. Scarlet's wonderful pearl necklace tore, and all the colorful pearls rolled onto the floor. Mrs. Scarlet doesn't remember the sequence, but she knows that adjacent pearls connect, when placed on dots when the switch flipped.
